name: StarGather
description:
ARE YOU READY TO CONTROL TWO SPACESHIPS AT THE SAME TIME?

StarGather is a Game about two spaceships fighting in the space together. 

That's a "Coop Single Player". You control  the two spaceships together using Mouse and Keyboard or Xbox Controller if you have. 

        Controls:

Red SpaceshipBlue SpaceShipMovementWASDMouse MovementFireSpaceLeft Mouse Click ButtonMovement (Joystick)Left Analog StickRight Analog StickFire (Joystick)Left TriggerRight Trigger

Have Fun =)
